title: Not Enough IP for runes.
body:
Dear Riot Games,
When I logged in this morning (and later on in the day today) I found I could not purchase the Life Steal Quint (same with the Lethalithy/MagPen, Spell Vamp, CDR, energy regen, experiance, health and health regen, and the health per lvl and per lvl health regen), despite having enough IP to purchase it.
I have seen the similar problem going back at least three, maybe four years.
Any and all assistance in this matter would be very much appreciated,

With regards,
         Nimue Alban

replies.body:
I've seen this pop up if there are issues with the New Client grabbing your actual IP balance. If you launch into the *Legacy Client* to make your purchase, you should have no further issues. You can access the Legacy Client from the login screen at any time:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi Targon,
Thanks for getting back to me.
The solution you provided did indeed work, thank you very much for throwing it out there.
